isLegalElementName

boolean isLegalElementName(java.lang.String elementName)
Check for possible elements: catch typos, old syntax and elements with identical names to global xml element parsers.

Parameters:
elementName -
Returns:
true if rule allows a element with that name

isLegalElementClass

boolean isLegalElementClass(java.lang.Class c)
Parameters:
c - class type
Returns:
true if rule accepts an element which, after parsing, is represented as a class of type 'c'

isLegalSubelementName

boolean isLegalSubelementName(java.lang.String elementName)
Parameters:
elementName -
Returns:
true if rule allows a sub-element with that name
